sqlMap.statement: DELETE FROM DS_OPEN_ORD WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

INSERT INTO DS_OPEN_ORD ( SELECT 'DS_OPEN_ORD' EZTABLEID ,'0' EZCANCELFLAG ,#ezintime# EZINTIME ,#ezintimezone# EZINTIMEZONE ,#ezincompanycode# EZINCOMPANYCODE ,#ezinuserid# EZINUSERID ,#ezinaplid#
